title: Adc mains, how do you live with yourselves?
body:
Like, I don't get it. You guys DO realize that there's a *good* reason why you're in the duo lane, right? How do you guys honestly think you're hot enough shit to go around wasting my elo and time by taking my hard work to make you into a threat and throwing it away like Amanda Bynes does with fame and sanity?

I can understand when a support is going like 0/5/5 or something if their adc is going like 4/2/1. I can see that the support just made the hard choice repeatedly.

I SHOULDN'T BE 2/1/14 WITH YOU BEING 4/9/6.

And holy shit why is it that I find people building MF like Busty Demoness would? WHAT TYPE OF CORE IS FUCKING THIS?

{{champion:21}} : https://i.gyazo.com/32f1fd592af7b1fc3a403ce56fd543a9.png

For the love of tap-dancing Teemo, why are adc players the bane of my existence? I WORK WITH YOU. YOU SHOULDN'T ALL BE THIS STUPID.
